job_name: 【PChome 網家集團】Vue 前端工程師
cust_name: 二十一世紀數位科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon 與 Paypal 結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一同挑戰。

此職務主要負責前端網頁的開發及維護，由於開發是一個全新的平台，你將可以擁有很高的自由度，與團隊一同研究產品方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個電商平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

【工作內容】
• 支付服務平台前端網頁開發。
• 電子商務購物網站平台網頁開發及維護。

【應徵條件】
• 熟悉 JavaScript、html、css及RWD。
• 熟悉 Ajax、jQuery、Bootstrap。
• 熟悉 Axios，具有 Restful API 串接能力。
• 熟悉 Git 操作。
• 一年以上 Vue 開發經驗。
• 三年以上前端網頁開發經驗。

【加分條件】
• 熟悉 Vuex 。
• 熟悉 使用過其他前端框架 (Flutter、React、Angular...等)。
• 熟悉 CI/CD。

job_name: 資深UX Designer
cust_name: 創意思境股份有限公司
job_detail:
工作內容：
● 協同業務進行客戶訪談，洞察使用者需求，或提出研究方式建議。
● 依專案需求進行規劃設計，包含資訊架構、操作流程、易用性等使用者體驗的順暢度與完整性。
● 與前後端工程師溝通規劃內容，並與其他設計師相互合作協調執行細節。
● 視專案需求進行概念驗證與易用性測試。
● 數據追蹤的埋設規劃與分析（以Google Analytics 為主)
● 觀測專案上線後的成效回饋，持續進行功能或內容面的優化。

職能條件：
● 熟悉 Prototype 工具（例：Sketch, Figma, Axure等）
● 熟悉UX相關研究方法的執行與分析（例：問卷設計、數據分析、使用者訪談等）
● 三~五年UX工作經驗，具RWD Web / Mobile Web / App等規劃實例，有大型系統平台規劃經驗，具管理經驗者優先。
● 具備良好的溝通表達能力，能主持並帶領團隊進行Workshop研討。
● 樂於接觸各類不同的產業，持續學習數位新知，並靈活應用於專案中。

job_name: 廣告流量開發經理/副理｜Inventory BD Manager
cust_name: 傑思愛德威媒體股份有限公司
job_detail:
豐富媒體科技Enrichmedia Tech Inc. 是傑思‧愛德威集團旗下的全資子公司，致力於提供市場具趨勢性的媒體產品應用科技，藉由代理、引進、開發、合資、投資等方式，將最具競爭力的產品科技應用於數位媒體領域上，開拓廣告新視野。

目前豐富媒體科技擁有自行開發且獨創的 IDEA Push 私域流量行銷系統 ( https://www.inside.com.tw/article/25356-jsadways-idea )，以及母公司日本上市企業愛德威集團(Adways Inc.) 所開發之獨家產品 UNICORN 全自動行銷廣告平台( https://www.js-adways.com.tw/news/618 ) 為銷售主力，尋找對新媒體與創新廣告產品有興趣的夥伴一起加入！

【工作內容】
1. 廣告流量的開發策略、目標擬定，並落實擴大廣告流量合作夥伴。
2. 進行流量合作夥伴的交易條件擬定、日常溝通與案件協商。
3. 商務或戰略合作夥伴之開拓，建立長期夥伴關係。
4. 市場動向收集、合作夥伴與客戶需求問題回饋，提出產品策略建議。
5. 產品廣告流量開發說明簡報的撰寫與解說。
6. 聚焦目標，進行內部跨部門協調與溝通。


【加分條件】 - 具有下列擇一經驗者佳！
1. 具有台灣之數位媒體流量 (媒體或KOL) 開發、對接或商務拓展經驗。
2. 熟悉LINE OA生態，具有Chatbot概念、使用或對接經驗。
3. 熟悉 RTB 概念與RTB媒體流量生態。

job_name: F0096 - Sr. Embedded Firmware Engineer(RTOS)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to rethink IT—not just by making powerful networking technology more accessible but by delivering frictionless product experiences tailored to our users. This pursuit begins at our R&D Center in Taiwan, where we build innovative products and a culture of trust, transparency, and collaboration.  

Responsibilities (What he/she will do after join UI):  
- Work with hardware and BSP team to deliver new UniFi products.  
- Implement and verify required product features.  
- Work with forum customers closely to implement desired new features and fix issues.  
- Read datasheets for relevant sensors, microcontrollers, etc., and implement drivers for them in embedded Linux environments.  

Minimum Qualifications (MUST-haves) :  
- PhD or MS in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering.  
- Detailed knowledge of operating system internals, C/C++ language, object-oriented design, as well as strong C/C++ debugging skills on embedded-systems.  
-Experience with BSP and Linux device driver development.  - Hands-on experience with Networking.  
- RTOS experience.  
- Team player can work independently and have the ability to take initiative.  
- Ability to organize and prioritize work across several projects.  
- Aggressive working attitude.  

Preferred Qualifications (Nice-to-haves / Plus) :  
- 5 yrs+ working experience as a software engineer.  
- Experience with L2/L3 switching features or Linux driver development.  
- Aggressive working attitude.  
- Team player, can work independently and have the ability to take initiative.  
- Ability to organize and prioritize work across several projects

Overview:
We are looking for someone who enjoys solving challenging problems and thrives in a collaborative, creative environment. In this role, you would work as a part of the global team of firmware, hardware engineers and designers to develop cutting edge networking products and technologies.

Responsibilities (What he/she will do after join UI):
- Bring-up, verification, and debug of new hardware platforms
- Microcontrollers firmware/driver/algorithm development

- BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience
- Embedded firmware development experience with C/C++
- Experience working with microcontrollers, build systems and toolchains
- Good understanding of real time operating systems
- Knowledge of software version control system
- Effective written and verbal communication skills


Preferred Qualifications (Nice-to-haves / Plus) :
- Experience with all phases of the software development life-cycle
- Experience with bash shell scripting and Python
- Experience with electronic test and measurement equipment

job_name: R0054 - L1 Firmware Engineer
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
The engineer will be responsible for the design and implementation of a wireless embedded system firmware solution.

You will work in L1 firmware to design wireless resource schedulers with radio measurement data and optimize radio performance under different scenarios.
You will work to improve the rate control algorithm and power control algorithm to maximize performance.

The position works closely with ASIC designers, system engineering team and QA team, to complete features and optimize system capabilities.
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
Must-haves:
- Minimum of 3 years firmware/software engineering and delivery of quality wireless/network products
- Excellent in C/C++ programming language.
- Excellent in L1 radio domain knowledge
- Excellent in network / system integration and troubleshooting.

- Experience with python or other object-oriented programming language with multi-thread/processing development.
- Experiences with LAN, L2/L3 Switch, VLAN, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, NAT, IGMP v2/v3, NTP, SNMP, 802.1x, QoS, and Firewall.

Nice-to-haves:
- Experiences with wireless security
- Experience with OFDM/OFDMA system
- Experience with mmWave technology

RECRUIT EXPRESS (TAIWAN) PTE LTD新加坡商立可人事顧問有限公司(北市就服字第0239號) RECRUIT EXPRESS成立於1996年，亞太區超過300名員工，分布於新加坡、台北、東京、香港、馬來西亞和澳洲，專攻人才招募、中高階主管獵才和人才派遣服務。台灣分公司成立於2001年，是立可在海外的第一站，在本地的人才招募以及約聘服務上注入一股新的力量。

「SearchAsia」提供中高階獵才服務及特殊專案服務，滿足客戶不同層面的招募需求。 專業的招募顧問群實踐立可最高使命”To help people find a good job, and our clients to succeed in business.”，招募顧問對立可而言，不單單是員工，而是和立可一同邁向成功的職涯夥伴，立可堅持全力投入員工的專業養成、協助員工在職涯上的發展、培養領導力。如果你/妳相信自己夠優秀，也想和立可的大家一同邁向成功、完成使命，歡迎你/妳的加入。


【工作職責】
1. 與企業客戶人資部、招募人員建立關係，保持雙方合作意向 
2. 每周定時與新的客戶接洽，討論不同類型的招募方案  
3. 與應徵者進行有效面試，並推薦合適的工作機會 
4. 推薦合適的候選人給企業客戶，完成客戶招募需求
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等

job_name: F0068-Senior Embedded Firmware Developer - LoRa
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
Location:
Taipei 105

Overview:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to rethink IT—not just by making powerful networking technology more accessible, but by delivering frictionless product experiences tailored to our users. This pursuit begins at our R&D Center in Taiwan, where we not only build innovative products, but a culture of trust, transparency, and collaboration.

We are looking for someone who enjoys solving challenging problems and thrives in a collaborative, creative environment. In this role, you would work as a part of the global team of firmware, hardware engineers, and designers to develop cutting-edge networking products and technologies based on LoRa.

Responsibilities (What he/she will do after join UI):
- Microcontrollers RTOS and Linux embedded firmware development
- Integrate the LoRa product into UniFi world based on LoRaWAN or private LoRa network
- Work with cross-functional teams to support product requirements for the UI products
Minimum Qualifications (MUST-haves) :
- BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience
- Familiar with Lora products and LoRaWAN protocol including cloud, gateway, and end node.
- Experience with embedded real-time operating systems, C/C++ development.
- Good at system performance tuning, debugging and power consumption analysis
- Effective written and verbal communication skills

Preferred Qualifications (Nice-to-haves / Plus) :
- Experience with all phases of the software development life-cycle
- Experience with Golang to develop the LoRaWan service
- Experience with bash shell scripting and Python
- Experience with electronic test and measurement equipment
- Experience in setup LoRaWAN environment including gateway bridge, network server, and application server

job_name: [數位商務事業部] 商品PM E-commerce Category merchandise
cust_name: 霖園關係企業_神坊資訊股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Job Description】
We are building a new e-commerce platform and sales team for Cathay Group's 14 million members. Our vision is to provide members unique shopping experience different from other platforms and to integrate with the group's CRM strategy, forming a complete ECO system from finance to retail services. 
Our company provides a great startup innovative environment and has resources from the corporate group. We welcome those who have experiences in e-commerce/retailing to join us, take on challenges together, sailing into the great future!

【Responsibilities】
1. Assist supervisors, execute product category development strategy, create sales plans, and achieve sales goal.
2. Execute various short-term projects assigned by the supervisors according to the market development strategy.
3. Products/Suppliers development and sales promotion planning.
4. Develop potential partners and guide suppliers to operate the system.
5. Communicate with suppliers, track product sales performance, and build strong relationships with customers and suppliers to generate sales leads. 
6. Collaborate with the multiple roles including Sales, Marketing, Analyst, Engineer to identify and implement further opportunities.
7. Maintain and update product site' content.



【Requirements and skills】
1. 3+ years of experience in B2C, B2B2C sales, business development, or e-commerce-related industry.
2. Experience in developing/negotiating with suppliers.
3. Utilize strong data analytical ability to optimize sales performance.
4. Sensitive to market and price changes.
5. Ability to work independently (in both sales and marketing fields).
other:
【Additional Requirements】
1. Familiar with two or more product categories or has e-commerce-related work experience.

job_name: 【PChome 網家集團】系統分析師 (Dev 技術職，需有程式開發經歷)
cust_name: 二十一世紀數位科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon與 Paypal結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一銅挑戰。

此職務偏重創新與規劃，由於開發是一個全新的平台，你將可以擁有很高的自由度，與團隊一同研究產品方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個電商平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

【工作內容】
1. 產品規劃 (金流支付產品及電子商務平台 ): 透過需求訪談、市場/商模研究來規劃規劃產品Roadmap，並實際規劃前後 台功能、流程、動線。
2. 管理產品相關的開發任務，撰寫開發之文件，包含需求規格、流程圖User flow、介面wireframe等。
3. 全程參與開發並確保產出沒有偏離規劃並與工程師有效溝通及掌管時程。
4. 功能完成上線後，監控並追蹤用戶的反饋及商業成效
5. 撰寫並提供為內部和外部以及協力廠商使用之使用者文件。
6. 視情況及意願參與軟體開發

【應徵條件】
• 熟悉電子商務或對電子商務平台規劃設計有濃厚興趣
• 有系統分析/產品管理實務經驗
• 2年以上軟體開發實務經驗

【加分條件】
• 備有金流串接或電商平台業務之導入經驗者優先考慮
skill: 軟體程式設計, 網路程式設計

job_name: 資深後端工程師 (二十一世紀數位)
cust_name: PChome Online_網路家庭國際資訊(股)公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon與 Paypal結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一銅挑戰。

此職務偏重後端開發，由於開發是一個全新的平台，你將可以擁有很高的開發自由度，與團隊一同研究技術方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個主要的電商務平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

【工作內容】
• 後端程式開發為主
• 電子商務購物網站平台應用程式開發及維運
• 支付服務平台開發
• 開發內外部夥伴支付工具串接之 Web API
• 大數據及風險控管軟體開發
• 其他內部系統開發

【應徵條件】
• 5年以上 C#.NET 或Jvar 程式開發經驗
• 熟悉 ASP.NET MVC 或 Java Spring 框架
• 熟悉 SQ L語法
• 具良好的程式碼習慣
• 能準確評估自己開發所需的時間
• 具備使用 git 或 TFVC 的經驗及習慣
skill: 軟體程式設計, 網路程式設計
other:
【加分條件】
• 具 Dapper/EF/NHibernate 等 ORM框 架經驗
• 有前後端整合經驗
• 熟悉 Ajax、Java Script、CSS 等相關網頁開發技術
• 對 Refactoring/Clear code 有堅定執著的信念

job_name: M0080 - Mechanical Product Designer (Industrial Switch)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
Overview:

At Ubiquiti, our mission is to rethink IT—not just by making powerful networking technology more accessible, but by delivering frictionless product experiences tailored to our users. This pursuit begins at our R&D Center in Taiwan, where we not only build innovative products, but a culture of trust, transparency, and collaboration.

Job details

The UISP MPD  is responsible for designing, developing, and testing all aspects of mechanical components and has a significant impact on product innovation, cost, schedule, and features.

Responsibilities:
- Create, experiment with, and evaluate new product concepts
- Improving designs on current products for longer life and more reliability, and 
   testing products at field locations.
- Capable of troubleshooting and debugging prototypes and MP Product 
- Perform tests and conduct engineering analysis.
- Write analytical reports and good practice documents.
- Responsible for project deliverables including the management of engineering 
   budgets, schedules, and customer interfaces.
- Work with global manufacturing resources, procurement, and outside suppliers to 
   meet UI technical, quality, and cost objectives
- Familiar with the mechanical  design of Industrial switch

Basic Qualifications:
- 8+ years of Industrial switch mechanical design experience.
- Experience in Industrial switch  product design is preferred.
- Familiar with Industrial switch mechanism design such as sheet metal & plastic 
   injection & die casting

cust_name: 酷澎股份有限公司
job_detail:
Introduction :

Coupang is one of the largest and fastest-growing e-commerce platforms on the planet. We solve problems no one has solved before to create a world where people ask, “How did we ever live without Coupang?”

Coupang international expansion team is expanding Coupang’s footprint outside Korea. We are working to not only extend the market-leading product and services that Coupang has built-in Korea but also to innovate based on local needs and preferences. We launched our first international services in the summer of 2021 in parts of Tokyo and Taipei. We plan to scale our E-commerce business as well as launch other commerce offerings in our target markets.

International expansion is one of the key focus areas of the company. We are hiring driven leaders who can hustle, solve tough problems, collaborate across teams, and ship high quality impactful products.


Key Responsibilities:


This role will own the strategy and execution of products designed

to acquire millions of new customers, activate them through the purchase funnel

and optimize the conversion metrics.

As the Senior Product Manager, Growth you will:

· Work with various teams to define the company’s growth plan to acquire customers

· Optimize user flows for signup, search and purchase that move the needle

· Strategize with the marketing team on channel or campaign-specific experiments to improve conversion

· Act as the primary business stakeholder for SEO implementation

· Share insights and experiment results with the broader leadership team

· Define, monitor, and measure success metrics after launch. Consistently integrate data and feedback into key product decisions



Qualifications :


· 7+ years of experience in product management

· Experience in building products from inception to scale will multiple iterations

· An ability to use data to prioritize and find opportunities for growth

· Demonstrated ability to work with cross-functional teams and manage multiple projects

· Bias for action and willingness to get your hands dirty to get the job done

· Excellent communication skills. Able to distill key takeaways quickly



Preferred:


· E-commerce experience

· Growth/user acquisition experience

· Experience in launching consumer facing products

· Startup experience

【關於我們】

PCCW Solutions 電訊盈科企業方案是 PCCW 電訊盈科集團 (香港上市公司 0008.HK) 旗下的 IT 服務公司，亦是於亞太地區各行各業首選的數位轉型和資訊服務合作夥伴，客戶群包括《富比士》全球 2000 強企業 (Forbes Global 2000) 中的 127 家企業客戶。 

我們採用最先進的資訊科技，協助包含金融業、製造業、零售業、電信業等企業客戶及相關政府單位，在不斷變化的經濟環境下數位轉型，創造業務價值並取得成功。

我們在亞太地區包括台灣、新加坡、馬來西亞、菲律賓、香港、澳門和中國大陸共設有14個辦公室，擁有全面、備受認可的資歷及大型專案管理經驗，成為各行各業客戶可靠的合作夥伴。

【職務說明】
     •	數位轉型策略規劃與執行
     •	企業流程診斷與營運建議
     •	新興科技與產業應用專案執行
     •	ESG 永續與數位科技整合
     •	專案時程與進度管理

job_name: 前端工程師   (二十一世紀數位)
cust_name: PChome Online_網路家庭國際資訊(股)公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon與 Paypal結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一同挑戰。

此職務主要負責前端網頁的開發及維護，由於開發的是一個全新的平台，你將可以擁有很高的開發自由度，與團隊一同研究技術方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個主要的電商務平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

【工作內容】
• 電子商務購物網站平台網頁開發及維護。
• 支付服務平台開發。
• 其他內部系統開發。
• 解決在不同瀏覽器上產生的相容性問題。

【應徵條件】
• 熟悉 JavaScript、html、css及RWD。
• 熟悉 Ajax、jQuery、Bootstrap。
• 具有 Restful API 串接能力。
• 熟悉 Git 操作。
• 兩年以上前端網頁開發經驗。
• 積極有熱忱、具有獨立解決問題能力、良好團隊溝通能力。
skill: 軟體程式設計, 網路程式設計
other:
【加分條件】
• 使用過前端框架 (Vue、React...等)。

job_name: M0062 - Packaging Component Engineer
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
Overview:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to simplify I.T. We strive for technology UX perfection everywhere — from our web store shopping experience, to product packaging details, to frictionless setup and installation flows. As a team, we value autonomy, so we want you to bring your ownership mindset in our pursuit of creating the best user experience. You’ll be challenged to use your creative problem-solving skills and work backwards to address the highest touch-point UX issues for our users, finding points of leverage and reducing risk. We place emphasis on working together, fostering an environment of trust and transparency.

As part of Packaging Design Team, you will need to think about how to make the perfect unboxing experience for users, keep the safety for transportation, out of the box, break impossibility, and be open to discussion in pursuit of perfection.
We don’t just expect you to build products simply but to be proud of what we do. 

Are you ready to embrace challenges in a fast-paced organization? 
Join UI, refresh us with your crazy but creative ideas, and make a great impact on the world together!

Responsibilities (What he/she will do after join UI):

NPI Sourcing
-Execute sourcing process by creating and executing RFPs and RFQs for new and existing suppliers.
-Develop and implement strategies for the packaging raw material category.
-Develop knowledge of new domestic and international markets in order to find new sources.
-Stays tuned with new materials and their cost trend.
-Proceed with the vendor code, NDA and PO process.

Cost Management
-Engages with the cross functional team from NPI through MP to identify suppliers and create cost BOM.
-Manage and analyze the existing prices, comparing competitive bids and identify reasonable prices.
-Monitors currency exchange rate and raw material cost trend.
-Monitors engineering changes, negotiates material pricing impact.
-Manages and negotiates EOL material liability of current product, work with supplier and project manager to minimize excess and obsolete inventory.

Suppliers / CM Management
-Establish metrics and tools to monitor supplier scorecard (Quality / On-time / Responsiveness).
-Develop and manage relationships with preferred suppliers.
-Reduce lead times in assigned commodity for PR build. Take appropriate actions to maintain on-time delivery of approved materials.
-Work with CM to confirm the cost BOM and implement new suppliers.
-Manage transfer build for MP project to reduce risks.

Minimum Qualifications (MUST-haves) :
-2+ years experienced in packaging sourcing / PM.
-Flexibility to work and achieve goals in a fast-paced environment.
-Strong negotiation, analytical and problem-solving skills.
-Knowledge of material processing for pulp tray, cardboard, blister, gift box, carton and all types of printing processes.
-Knowledge and experience with various packaging markets and suppliers.
-Strong Project Management skills and experience.
-Ability to organize and analyze data by Excel and ERP system.

job_name: 臺北醫學大學112年度玉山計畫學者招募公告
cust_name: 臺北醫學大學
job_detail:
一、招募說明：
為延攬國際頂尖人才以提升本校國際學術能量，以及吸引國際人才來臺任教，推動本校研究及產學重點發展，達成國際研究影響力目標，特辦理「教育部補助大專校院延攬國際頂尖人才-玉山計畫學者」徵求。
二、招募專長領域：
生物醫學及相關領域之學者，以癌症轉譯醫學、神經醫學、胸腔醫學、AI人工智慧、醫療器材研發、細胞治療及免疫治療、心臟醫學、腎臟醫學等研究領域尤佳。
三、申請資格：
1.取得最高學歷10年以內，並符合下列條件之一：
(1)曾服務於國際一流學術研究機構或國際知名公司任職5年以上，並具有發展潛力。
(2)有執行重大研究計畫之經驗。
(3)近5年之學術貢獻於所屬領域表現優異。
2.其他聘任資格(詳附件一臺北醫學大學聘任資格及薪資待遇)。
3.不得為我國學校及學術研究機構現職專任人員，於聘任後依學術領域專長選擇適合之系所。
四、薪資待遇：
1.學校助理教授薪資及教育部彈性薪資補助890,000元至2,870,000元/年。
2.學校副教授薪及教育部彈性薪資補助1,000,000元至3,220,000元/年。
3.學校教授薪資及教育部彈性薪資補助1,250,000元至3,710,000元/年。
五、申請方式及期限：
1.應繳文件：過去五年學術研究表現(個人履歷資料、學術之重要貢獻、著作發表明細、曾獲得之學術得獎情形、重要之學術研究成果等) 、推薦函兩封。
2.繳交時間：111年12月31日下午5時止，Email至臺北醫學大學人力資源處international.faculty@tmu.edu.tw。
六、聯絡人：
人力資源處連正曄小姐、劉伊芝小姐，電子郵件：international.faculty@tmu.edu.tw
 
 
 
一、其他聘任資格
1.助理教授：符合下列之一
(1)經教育部審定助理教授資格合格者。
(2)在國內外大學或研究所研究，得有博士學位，成績優良，並有專門著作者。
(3)曾任講師三年以上，成績優良，並有專門著作者。
(4)具有碩士學位，曾從事與所習學科有關之研究工作、專門職業或職務四年以上，成績優良，並有專門著作者。
(5)大學或獨立學院醫學系、中醫學系、牙醫學系畢業，擔任臨床工作九年以上，其中至少曾任醫學中心主治醫師四年，成績優良，並有專門著作者。
2.副教授：符合下列之一
(1)經教育部審定副教授資格合格者。
(2)曾任助理教授三年以上，成績優良，並有重要之著作者。
(3)具有博士學位，曾從事與所習學科有關之研究工作、專門職業或職務四年以上，有創作或發明，在學術上有重要貢獻或著作者。
3.教授：符合下列之一
(1)經教育部審定教授資格合格者。
(2)曾任副教授三年以上，成績優良，並有重要之著作者。
(3)具有博士學位，曾從事與所習學科有關之研究工作、專門職業或職務八年以上，有創作或發明，在學術上有重要貢獻或著作者。
 
二、學校固定薪資
1.助理教授級(博士) 890,000 ~ 1,370,000元/年
2.副教授級1,000,000 ~ 1,720,000元/年
3.教授級1,250,000 ~ 2,210,000元/年
 
三、教育部彈性薪資
教育部每年至多補助1,500,000元/年
 
四、研究經費補助
新進1年內教師提供1,000,000元
 
五、保險及退休保障
公保、健保、團體保險、退撫儲金、退撫福利基金
 
六、重要福利
附屬醫院就醫優待(本人及眷屬)、互助金(結婚、生育、退休、患病住院、喪葬、重大災害等補助)、生活協助(住宿、搬遷等)
 
七、薪資範圍
聘任類別 玉山計畫學者
每月薪資
【學校固定薪資+教育部非固定薪資補助(以至多估算)】 助理教授級890,000元至2,870,000元/年
副教授級1,000,000元至3,220,000元/年
教授級1,250,000元至3,710,000元/年

job_name: R0034 - Antenna design engineer
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
Responsibilities:
- Design, simulate, test, and document the best solutions for antennas in indoor, outdoor and consumer products to meet suitable antenna requirements including TRP, TIS, radiation pattern, return loss, and antenna efficiency in actual usage conditions
- Perform trade-off studies between antenna performance, RF performance, regulatory compliance, mechanical constraints, industrial design intent, size and quality.
- Lead the antenna design for products, working closely in an interdisciplinary team, through the entire product life cycle
major: 電機電子工程相關 通信學類
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
Must-haves:
- Master’s or PHD of Science Degree in an engineering discipline with emphasis in RF/Microwave technical measurement.
-Experience performing analysis on antenna performance and also have desense troubleshooting experience.
- Must be familiar with radio related test equipment such as network analyzers, and OTA chamber. better understanding auto testing scripts for RF testing items.
Must have experience characterizing radio performance in ISM band freq, and ultra high freq antenna.
- Experience on doing HFSS/CST simulation tools.
- Knowledge of practical RF system considerations such as path loss calculation, cascade noise figure, and intercept point is desirable.
- Design experience with WLAN
- Architect, design, prototype, and validate Antenna subsystems for multi radio products ( WiFi, BT, Zigbee, etc).

Nice-to-haves:
- ADS simulation tool.
- Good English communication.
- Layout Pads.
- Design experience with microwave or mmWave phased array antennas or horn or LTE antenna.
- Basic software skills in python and/or Matlab.

job_name: 【PChome 網家集團】Cloud Engineer
cust_name: 二十一世紀數位科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon與 Paypal結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一同挑戰。

此職務偏重創新與規劃，你將可以擁有很高的自由度，與團隊一同研究產品方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個電商平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

【職務內容】
1. 維運公司現有系統之雲端服務(Azure / AWS)。
2. 依新專案之需求架構規劃與建置雲端環境(基於Azure / AWS)
3. 協助公司現有架構轉型導入Container Service(k8s/…)


【職務需求】
1. 具任一公有雲的使用經驗，如：GCP、AWS、Azure
2. 具 Networking 等技術的相關知識
3. 具 Linux 與 Windows 的基礎服務建置，以及異常問題排除能力


【加分條件】
1. 具 Azure 相關產品的導入與技術支援經驗
2. 持有 GCP、AWS 或 Azure 等任一相關技術認證
3. 至少略懂一種以上的程式語言(Java / C# / PHP…)
4. 參與 Agile DevOps 的設計，開發、測試和發布項目

job_name: Technical Sales Engineer
cust_name: 康泰智能科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
We are a biotech startup about to launch new products to the world.  Looking for a smart and motivated individual to join our team.  Want to be a part of force that help uncovering neuroscience and brain diseases while having fun?  Some of the responsibilities includes:  

1. Coordinate with top neuroscientists around the world on product needs and requirements.
2. Propose standardized and customized product solutions 
3. Research products and technologies associated with neuroscience applications 
4. Draft technical documents.
5. Plan and execute product marketing material including, usage guide, tutorial videos etc.
6. Monitor and manage customer inquiries and maintain internal/external knowledge base 
7. Manage digital marketing efforts. Experience in Google AdWords and targeted selling is a plus. Note: we do not sell to the consumer segment. Must demonstrate ability to target specific sales using non traditional channels and establish KPI. 
  
We are currently only consider native English speaker.  Having engineering or science background is required.  Must have fundamental understanding of life science research and its applications. We welcome recent graduate in science and engineering who is eager to learn about neurotechnology and neuroscience.  Ideal candidate must be creative, flexible and have a can-do attitude.  We are not looking for traditional PM or Sales Manager roles.  

This role qualifies for sales bonus.

This pursuit begins at our R&D Center in Taiwan, where we not only build innovative products, but a culture of trust, transparency, and collaboration.

- Report projects’ status and issue tracking to internal.

job_name: [小樹購] 前端工程師 Frontend Engineer(Junior/Senior )
cust_name: 霖園關係企業_神坊資訊股份有限公司
job_detail:
【本職缺僅接受網站投遞】
請至公司網站投遞個人履歷表，此職缺履歷登錄網址：https://bit.ly/3yzuQr3

【產品說明】
我們正在為國泰集團1400萬會員建立一個全新的電商平台小樹購 [https://treebuy.com/]，希望提供集團會員有別於一般電商平台的購物樂趣，並與國泰集團整體的會員經營策略整合，由金融到零售，形成完整的生態系統。
我們擁有新創的環境與集團的資源，歡迎對電商有相關經驗或對電商有興趣的開發好手加入我們，一起接受挑戰！

【職務說明】
你將投入電商平台的產品架構設計、開發及維運，並持續優化系統、重構、功能迭代，提供給使用者更好的體驗及提升系統品質。
參與 Scrum 開發團隊與成員密切協作，可以因應市場情況、產品策略敏捷調整。除了投入在開發外，期待你樂意分享技術、具備 DevOps 精神、勇於回饋團隊的成員加入。

 【工作內容】
1. 使用 vue.js、vuex 與 Node.js 相關技術開發電商平台
2. 基於 AWS 雲端，設計規劃系統架構及開發建置
3. 維護產品及服務可靠度與系統最佳化
4. 與其他成員 code review 、撰寫技術開發相關文件
5. 參與 Scrum 團隊與夥伴共同參與產品功能討論
6. 持續對規劃、討論、開發、驗證的協作流程提出建議

 【必備條件】
1. 擁有三年以上的產品開發與工作經驗
2. 熟悉一種現代前端框架（Vue.js / React.js）
3. 具備 JavaScript, CSS, HTML, NodeJs 前端開發專業知識

 【資深條件】
1. 具有 SSR 開發經驗
2. 具備前端元件設計、Unit Testing 開發經驗
3. 具備 web performance tuning 相關的經驗
4. 重視程式碼與版本控制提交品質

 【加分條件】
1. 具有電商平台開發經驗
2. 具有 Scrum 敏捷開發經驗
3. 具備雲端服務的基礎知識，且有 CI/CD 部署流程經驗
4. 具有任一後端語言開發經驗
5. 具備指導其他人提昇工作能力的經驗, 曾經帶領他人應用新技術完成工作目標

job_name: M0053 - Packaging Design Engineer
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
Overview:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to simplify I.T. We strive for technology UX perfection everywhere — from our web store shopping experience, to product packaging details, to frictionless setup and installation flows. As a team, we value autonomy, so we want you to bring your ownership mindset in our pursuit of creating the best user experience. You’ll be challenged to use your creative problem-solving skills and work backwards to address the highest touch-point UX issues for our users, finding points of leverage and reducing risk. We place emphasis on working together, fostering an environment of trust and transparency.

As part of Packaging Design Team, you will need to think about how to make the perfect unboxing experience for users, keep the safety for transportation, out of the box, break impossibility, and be open to discussion in pursuit of perfection.
We don’t just expect you to build products simply but to be proud of what we do.

Are you ready to embrace challenges in a fast-paced organization?
Join UI, refresh us with your crazy but creative ideas, and make a great impact on the world together!

Responsibilities (What he/she will do after join UI):
- Mainly focus on packaging design until mass production.
- Create packaging drawing / structure / concept
- Develop new material / finish / process / UX improvement.
- Sample / DFM / SOP review
- Internal - Work closely with ID / ME / PM / Graphic team.
- External - Work closely with CMs / Suppliers.

Minimum Qualifications (MUST-haves) :
- Logical thinking / Proactive personality.
- Effective communication and time management skills.
- 3+ years of experience in development of packaging structure design.
- Experienced using 2D: AutoCAD / Illustrator.
- Experienced using 3D: Rhino or Solidworks or ProE / Keyshot.
- Knowledge of material processing for pulp tray, cardboard, blister, gift box, carton and all types of printing processes.
- Knowledge of a wide variety of packaging style, type and material.
- Knowledge of reliability tests.

Preferred Qualifications (Nice-to-haves / Plus) :
- Industrial design background
- Leadership in projects
specialty: Rhino, Illustrator, Key Shot, AutoCAD, Pro/E

cust_name: 傑思愛德威媒體股份有限公司
job_detail:
豐富媒體科技Enrichmedia Tech Inc. 是傑思‧愛德威集團旗下的全資子公司，致力於提供市場具趨勢性的媒體產品應用科技，藉由代理、引進、開發、合資、投資等方式，將最具競爭力的產品科技應用於數位媒體領域上，開拓廣告新視野。

目前豐富媒體科技擁有自行開發且獨創的 IDEA Push 私域流量行銷系統 ( https://www.inside.com.tw/article/25356-jsadways-idea )，以及母公司日本上市企業愛德威集團(Adways Inc.) 所開發之獨家產品 UNICORN 全自動行銷廣告平台( https://www.js-adways.com.tw/news/618 ) 為銷售主力，尋找對新媒體與創新廣告產品有興趣的夥伴一起加入！

【工作內容】
1. 進行產品的營運、行銷活動規劃，並設定具體可量化的目標。
2. 追蹤產品成效、分析服務或活動效益，提出優化策略並執行。
3. 分析產品數據與使用者行為洞察，規劃產品發展策略。
4. 搭配產品開發進程，掌控銷售進度，制定具體策略並量化目標。
5. 撰寫產品銷售文件與進行教育訓練。
6. 聚焦目標，進行內部跨部門協調與溝通。

1. 熟悉LINE OA生態，具有Chatbot概念、使用或對接經驗。
2. 具有 RTB 媒體產品概念或營運經驗。

job_name: 產品經理/系統分析師 (二十一世紀數位)
cust_name: PChome Online_網路家庭國際資訊(股)公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon與 Paypal結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一銅挑戰。

此職務偏重創新與規劃，由於開發是一個全新的平台，你將可以擁有很高的自由度，與團隊一同研究產品方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個電商平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

【工作內容】
1. 產品規劃 (金流支付產品及電子商務平台 ): 透過需求訪談、市場/商模研究來規劃規劃產品Roadmap，並實際規劃前後 台功能、流程、動線。
2. 管理產品相關的開發任務，撰寫開發之文件，包含需求規格、流程圖User flow、介面wireframe等。
3. 全程參與開發並確保產出沒有偏離規劃並與工程師有效溝通及掌管時程。
4. 功能完成上線後，監控並追蹤用戶的反饋及商業成效
5. 撰寫並提供為內部和外部以及協力廠商使用之使用者文件。
6. 視情況及意願參與軟體開發

【應徵條件】
• 熟悉電子商務或對電子商務平台規劃設計有濃厚興趣
• 有系統分析/產品管理實務經驗
• 2年以上軟體開發實務經驗
skill: 軟體程式設計, 網路程式設計
other:
【加分條件】

job_name: R0049 - Hardware engineer (AI Camera related)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to rethink IT—not just by making powerful networking technology more accessible, but by delivering frictionless product experiences tailored to our users. This pursuit begins at our R&D Center in Taiwan, where we not only build innovative products, but a culture of trust, transparency, and collaboration.

Are you ready to embrace challenges in a fast-paced organization?
Join UI, refresh us with your crazy but creative ideas, and make a great impact on the world together!

Responsibilities:
- Mainly focus for system schematic review and mechanical stacking review with mechanical engineers and PCB layout review with layout engineers.
- Work with RF engineers to figure out performance issues of radios and work with SI and DQA engineers to qualify features and make sure product quality is ready to move further.
- Review design derating and suggest design update due to DFM (design for manufacturing), DFA(design for assembly) and DFC (Design For Cost.)
- Schematic and BOM maintenance and review.
- Write test plans for testing coverage, execute tests, and document test results for projects.
- Report projects’ status and issue tracking to internal.
- Teardown and review new products in the market.
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
Must-haves:
- 3~5 years’ work experience as a Key EE designer for Camera system design.
- Have the MP experience with camera or camera module design.
- Familiarity with high-speed signal design. (Especially for MIPI, VLSC-EC, PCIE and USB)
- Familiarity with the SerDes interface with the multi-camera system.	
- Have multi-camera design experience for camera systems.
- Have experience with the image stitching and image calibration for multi-camera systems.
- Proficiency on using OrCad Capture CIS, Power PCB viewer and Allegro viewer
- Knowledge of electronic components (Ex. R/L/C/Diode/MOS/BJT/Logic ICs/Sensors)
- Strong knowledge of ESD, EMI.
- Debug skills with the basic operation with oscilloscopes, Logical Analyzers.

Nice-to-haves:
- Familiar with the camera applications for AI and Avoidance.
- Leadership in projects
- Aggressive, open-minded and positive attitude
- Familiarity with the network configuration
- Familiarity with test equipment like TDR, Network Analyzers

job_detail:
Jobs Description


Build, develop and enhance processes that collect, manage, and convert raw data into usable information for data analysts and business analysts to interpret.

Implement methods to improve data reliability and quality. Combine raw information from different sources to create consistent and machine-readable/processable formats. Develop and test architectures that enable data extraction and transformation for predictive or prescriptive analysis and modeling. Manage and monitor data availability, integrity, and accuracy.

The ideal candidate is someone who masters database design/warehousing and SQL statements constructions to efficiently query/manage data with minimum effort and cost. Continuously working with the business team to gather requirements and improve/optimize the analytical database for better performance. A solid understanding and experience in data porting between applications/storage are recommended.
other:
- 2+ years experience as a data engineer or in a similar role.
- Familiarity in working with a high volume of transactional data
- Hands-on experience with SQL database design and management
- Great numerical and analytical skills
- Technical expertise with data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques
- Experience in Salesforce reporting and data migration
- Good communication skills, listening & understanding, flexibility & teamwork
- Independent thinking and planning. Flexible in personality and willing to embrace complexity and diversity at work

job_name: 輿情社群經營
cust_name: 伊瑪格科技有限公司
job_detail:
【我們是誰？】

我們是miclub米客邦，在跨足群眾募資領域後，2020-2021兩年間即創造10個「千萬級專案」，9個專案上榜年度「集資金額」、「集資人次」TOP10，其中包含2020年度的「最高集資金額」&「最高集資人次」！

在米客邦，每周都有挑不完的新品，找對產品，就先贏了一半。
因為我們從不為產品找市場，我們專門為市場找產品。

 

【這是一個什麼職缺？】

這是一個需要跨領域人才的職缺，這裡結合了公關、行銷、客服、程式的能力，但我們不會要求你是樣樣精，我們更希望你是樣樣通，對我們來說，通才比專精更為重要。
我們希望部門夥伴間能夠互相補強一起成長，希望你能展現你的能力，協助我們做好輿情蒐集的工作。

 

【工作內容】

✔ 經營管理社群平台：透過日互動回覆，積極與粉絲用戶維護關係並建立品牌形象。
✔ 社群媒體策略擬定：透過社群輿情收集，搭配組織目標及計劃提出優化策略，以擴大 miclub 的社群影響力。
✔ 社群媒體輿情監測：深入了解社群生態，強化與TA溝通對話能力。
✔ 業界趨勢觀察：產業界重要利益關係人事物重點進程更新。
✔ 其他主管交辦事項



【我們希望你…】

✔ 要求時程管理能力
✔ 可以獨立作業
✔ 具備細心特質
✔ 適合反應快、理解能力強
✔ 具備良好的團隊合作、跨部門溝通及協商能力

 

▌你需要會的技能是：

1. 擁有文字敏銳度，擅長文字溝通能力
2. 資料查訊、邏輯分析能力
3. 高度細心、換位思考能力
4. 具備社群網路生態基本了解

 

▌幫助你加分的項目：

✔ 履歷附上社群媒體或論壇相關實作作品
✔ Google、Facebook廣告投放經驗
✔ 有社群話題操作之經驗
✔ 擔任過社群小編
✔ 擔任過客服相關職位



【薪酬福利】

1. 基本薪資：32,000 ~ 40,000 TWD/月
2. 試用期：3個月
3. 排班方式：正常日班進辦公室，但假日需輪班進行社群回覆工作
4. 績效獎金：每月自評績效核定頒發績效獎金
5. 其餘未盡事宜依照勞基法規定辦理
6. 不定期舉辦快閃下午茶、聚餐、紓壓活動、團建活動



【溫馨提醒】

1. 請從平台投遞履歷，合適者將主動聯繫，不合適者將不另行通知唷
2. 請注意你提供的信箱通知
3. 面試需自備筆記型電腦

job_name: R0039 - Hardware engineer (camera)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to simplify I.T. We strive for technology UX perfection everywhere — from our web store shopping experience, to product packaging details, to frictionless setup and installation flows. As a team, we value autonomy, so we want you to bring your ownership mindset in our pursuit of creating the best user experience. You’ll be challenged to use your creative problem-solving skills and work backwards to address the highest touch-point UX issues for our users, finding points of leverage and reducing risk. We place emphasis on working together, fostering an environment of trust and transparency.

As part of the Protect Camera Hardware team, you will need to think out of the box, break every impossibility, and be open to discussion in pursuit of perfection.
We don’t just expect you to build products simply but to be proud of what we do.

Are you ready to embrace challenges in a fast-paced organization?
Join UI, refresh us with your crazy but creative ideas, and make a great impact on the world together!

Responsibilities:
- Mainly focus on the new camera hardware design .
- Circuit design , layout review and design verification .
- Work closely with the BSP team and ME team .
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
Must-haves:
- Have experience in solving issues of the camera systems.
- Good understanding of High-Speed-Signal design including the impedance control.
- At least 2yr+ experience as Camera Hardware Engineer
- Proficiency on using  OrCad Capture CIS,  Power PCB viewer and Allegro viewer
- Knowledge of electronic components (Ex. R/L/C/Diode/MOS/BJT/Logic ICs/Sensors)
- MS/BS in Electronic Engineering or related fields.
- Strong knowledge of ESD, EMI.
- Debug skills with the basic operation with oscilloscopes, Logical Analyzers.


Nice-to-haves:
- Familiar with the camera systems and platforms.
- Worked on camera related products and still hands on
- Leadership in projects
- 5 yrs+  working experience as HW engineer
- Aggressive, open-minded and positive attitude
- Familiarity with the network configuration
- Familiarity with the image sensor sub-system design
- Familiarity with test equipment like TDR, Network Analyzers .

job_name: R0033 - Hardware engineer (Wireless)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
At Ubiquiti, you will be responsible for HW architecture and designs of radios, switches and next generation smart things etc.. The candidates must be very aggressive to provide suggestions and comments at the design stages. Thinking widely and making decisions for designs.

Responsibilities:
- Product hardware development, schematics design, layout review, BOM maintenance, functionality verification, planning of production testing, and failure analysis
- Work with RF engineers to figure out performance issues of radios.
- Review design derating and suggest design update due to DFM (design for manufacturing), DFA(design for assembly) and DFC (Design For Cost.)
- Report projects’ status and issue tracking to internal.
- Survey and evaluate potential technologies for related products. Teardown and review new products in the market.
major: 電機電子工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
Must-haves:
- 5yrs working experience at least.
- BS or MS in EE engineering.
- Good working knowledge of system level architecture and RF fundamentals. And RF fundamentals and Switch applications, PoE etc..
- Can communicate with foreign engineers directly
- Basic knowledge of EE lab equipment including: oscilloscopes, multimeters, power supplies, etc.
- Familiar with QCA/MTK platforms
- Good understanding of RF metrics
- Proficiency on PCB and Schematic tools such as pads, allegro, orcad etc..

Nice-to-haves:
- Familiar with EE and RF parts and its fundamental mechanism and its applications.
- very organized on platforms and innovative on product concepts.
- Leadership in a project. Better to have experience managing teams of 3+ engineers.

job_name: 【社群行銷專員】#社群小編 #數位行銷 #電商社群 #社群編輯
cust_name: 逗寶國際有限公司
job_detail:
逗寶是結合國際貿易、電子商務和新零售為主的時尚母嬰品牌，致力於打造時尚育兒新文化。在逗寶獨特的商業佈局下，我們更注重內部管理，不斷優化各種多元的員工教育訓練、薪資福利與升遷制度！
2013年新創起家，如今已成為「年輕、時尚、專業」的百人團隊，我們仍舊強力徵求不畏挑戰、滿腔熱血、熱愛達成目標的你一起加入團隊！

【工作內容】
1. 經營逗寶社群平台(FB、IG、Youtube等)，創造優質的素材以提升互動與點擊
2. 社群宣傳內容的發想與執行，用最創意&最吸睛的手法，讓粉絲愛上逗寶！
3. 進行社群成效分析，時時掌握社群動向
4. 參與直播&拍攝影片，用最貼心及最熱情的方式，向粉絲介紹產品活動
5. 社群行銷專案規畫執行，活動提案&規劃、目標設定、成效分析與行動優化等
6.其他主管交辦事項

因應業務成長需求，規劃聘僱人員工作職務如下：
1. 執行開發及整合公司內部所需應用系統及對外銷售產品研發。
2. 規劃所負責產品(流程管理平台)的系統分析與系統設計。
3. 處理所負責產品(流程管理平台)專案之系統建置、需求執行與問題處理

job_name: F0100 - MCU Firmware Engineer(Talk/AmpliFi)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to rethink IT—not just by making powerful networking technology more accessible, but by delivering frictionless product experiences tailored to our users. This pursuit begins at our R&D Center in Taiwan, where we not only build innovative products, but a culture of trust, transparency, and collaboration.


Job Description

In this role you will implement the firmware of home entertainment product line, to make the best user experience product You will also implement features to support hardware testing and diagnosis of various kinds of embedded devices. This is a highly cross functional role and you’ll work closely with various teams, like EE, Backend, Frontend, Mobile, QA, Factory and Manufacturing.

Basic Qualifications

-Solid C/C++ coding abilities
-Strong software debugging skills
-Familiar with networking MCUs development (one of Ethernet/WiFi/BLE/LPWAN/LTE).
-Experience working with Bluetooth/WiFi Stack on MCU systems (HCI with UART/USB).
-Experience working with microcontrollers, build systems and toolchains.
-Good understanding of real time operating systems.
-Familiar with firmware upgrade or OTA upgrade.
-Familiar with MCU operating modules, including NVIC, memory, clock, thread, DMA, peripheral interface including PWM, SPI, I2C, USB, UART, GPIO.
-Familiarity with Git/Jenkins
-A team player, self-motivated, loves difficult challenges, and is ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

The engineer will be responsible for the design and implementation of test software and automated test suites to verify and validate applications in scope of protocols, system performance, and system applications.

- Excellent in Linux server setup, system administration and working on Linux.

job_name: F0058 - Embedded Firmware Engineer(AmpliFi)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to simplify I.T. We strive for technology UX perfection everywhere — from our web store shopping experience, to product packaging details, to frictionless setup and installation flows. As a team, we value autonomy, so we want you to bring your ownership mindset in our pursuit of creating the best user experience. You’ll be challenged to use your creative problem-solving skills and work backwards to address the highest touch-point UX issues for our users, finding points of leverage and reducing risk. We place emphasis on working together, fostering an environment of trust and transparency.

Job Description

In this role you will implement the firmware of home entertainment product line, to make the best user experience product
You will also implement features to support hardware testing and diagnosis of various kinds of embedded devices.
This is a highly cross functional role and you’ll work closely with various teams, like EE, Backend, Frontend, Mobile, QA, Factory and Manufacturing.

Basic Qualifications
-A genuine passion for embedded software development.
-Solid C/C++ coding abilities
-Strong software debugging skills
-Familiarity with embedded Linux firmware development
-Familiarity with Linux IPC programming
-Familiarity with Git/Jenkins
-A team player, self-motivated, loves difficult challenges, and is ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
-BS/MS in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent.
-Fluent in both written and spoken English to work effectively within a highly collaborative environment with colleagues around the world.

Preferred Qualifications
-Experience in PulseAudio, Gstreamer or Linux audio pipeline is a plus
-Experience in real-time streaming protocol is a plus
-Experience in AVR, smart speaker or sound bar is a plus
-Experience in Dolby, HomeKit or DTs certification is a plus

job_name: [小樹生活圈] 全端工程師 Fullstack Engineer (Junior/Senior)
cust_name: 霖園關係企業_神坊資訊股份有限公司
job_detail:
【本職缺僅接受網站投遞】
請至公司網站投遞個人履歷表，此職缺履歷登錄網址：https://bit.ly/3zeXg8N

【職務說明】
產品架構設計、開發及維運，並持續優化系統、重構、功能迭代，提供給使用者更好的體驗及提升系統品質。
透過 Scrum 團隊運作，可以因應市場情況、產品策略敏捷調整。除了投入在開發外，期待樂意分享技術、具備 DevOps 精神、勇於回饋團隊的成員加入。

【工作內容】
1. 使用AWS服務(SQS, Lambda, ECS, RDS, S3...etc)打造產品及服務。
2. 前後端系統架構設計規劃及開發建置。
3. 產品維運、服務可靠度提升與系統最佳化。
4. 撰寫技術開發相關文件。
5. 與團隊共同參與產品討論。
6. 持續對規劃、討論、開發、驗證的協作流程提出建議。

【必備條件】
1. 1年以上的前後端開發經驗。
2. 有Cloud Computing經驗(AWS尤佳)。
3. 使⽤後端框架 (Django, Flask, Nodejs, etc) 的開發經驗。
4. 使用前端框架 (Vuejs, Reactjs, etc) 的開發經驗。
5. 熟悉 RWD 網頁與各瀏覽器相容性。
6. 熟悉程式碼版本控制工具，例如Git。
7. 至少熟悉一套關聯式資料庫 (RDBMS) 的設計與操作。
8. 熟悉RESTful API設計和實作。
9. 熟悉基本的 Docker 概念與操作。
10.	正向看待每件事物，勇於接受各種挑戰。

【加分條件】
1. 熟悉 Python 後端 Framework (Django, Flask)。
2. 熟悉任⼀套單元測試框架。
3. 具有 CI/CD、DevOps 相關經驗。
4. 曾以 AWS Lambda 開發過無伺服器運算的應用程式。
5. 熟悉 OAuth 2.0 概念與流程。
6. 熟悉 Networking。
7. 重視程式碼與版本控制提交品質。
8. 熟悉 Django ORM。
9. 具備 NPM, Webpack 體系的前端開發經驗。

【產品說明】
小樹生活提供國泰金融集團與霖園集團客戶最佳的忠誠計畫體驗，小樹會員與小樹點從 2020 年上線至今已累積數百萬會員。加入小樹產品團隊能開啟多元的商業合作、大規模商轉服務的經營、以及充實的產品規劃開發經驗，歡迎來自不同背景的人才加入。
major: 數學及電算機科學學科類 資訊管理相關
specialty: Git, Python, MySQL, RDBMS, AWS, Django

job_name: F0074 - Embedded Firmware Engineer(Linux Developer)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to simplify I.T. We strive for technology UX perfection everywhere — from our web store shopping experience to product packaging details, to frictionless setup and installation flows. As a team, we value autonomy, so we want you to bring your ownership mindset in our pursuit of creating the best user experience. You'll be challenged to use your creative problem-solving skills and work backwards to address the highest touch-point UX issues for our users, finding points of leverage and reducing risk. We place emphasis on working together, fostering an environment of trust and transparency.  

Job Description 
• In this role you will implement the firmware of home entertainment product line, to make the best user experience product 
• You will also implement features to support hardware testing and diagnosis of various kinds of embedded devices. 
• This is a highly cross functional role and you’ll work closely with various teams, like EE, Backend, Frontend, Mobile, QA, Factory and Manufacturing.  

Basic Qualifications 
• A genuine passion for embedded software development. 
• Solid C/C++ coding abilities 
• Familiarity with embedded Linux firmware development 
• Familiarity with Linux IPC/Socket programming 
• Familiarity with Network protocols, like: TCP/IP, DHCP, NTP, RTP, HTTPS...,etc 
• Familiarity with Git/Jenkins 
• A team player, self-motivated, loves difficult challenges, and is ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment 
• BS/MS in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent. 
• Fluent in both written and spoken English to work effectively within a highly collaborative environment with colleagues around the world.  

Preferred Qualifications 
• Experience in VoIP/IoT product is a plus 
• Experience in packet analysis is a plus

cust_name: 宏碁雲架構服務股份有限公司

宏碁雲架構服務股份有限公司主要提供企業專業的電子化資訊管理服務，除已整合機房、系統、網路、資安之維運管理能力外，隨著雲端服務隨取即用的需求及巨量資料各種應用的崛起，宏碁雲架構也持續自行開發了各種服務解決方案，主要業務範疇包含機房建置與實體設施維運、災難備援、雲端及大數據等服務。

job_name: 資深後端工程師(C#.Net, Java)
cust_name: 二十一世紀數位科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon與 Paypal結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一銅挑戰。

此職務偏重後端開發，由於開發是一個全新的平台，你將可以擁有很高的開發自由度，與團隊一同研究技術方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個主要的電商務平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

【工作內容】
• 後端程式開發為主
• 電子商務購物網站平台應用程式開發及維運
• 支付服務平台開發
• 開發內外部夥伴支付工具串接之 Web API
• 大數據及風險控管軟體開發
• 其他內部系統開發

【應徵條件】
• 5年以上 C#.NET 或Jvar 程式開發經驗
• 熟悉 ASP.NET MVC 或 Java Spring 框架
• 熟悉 SQ L語法
• 具良好的程式碼習慣
• 能準確評估自己開發所需的時間
• 具備使用 git 或 TFVC 的經驗及習慣

【加分條件】
• 具 Dapper/EF/NHibernate 等 ORM框 架經驗
• 有前後端整合經驗
• 熟悉 Ajax、Java Script、CSS 等相關網頁開發技術
• 對 Refactoring/Clear code 有堅定執著的信念
skill: 軟體程式設計, 網路程式設計

job_name: F0092 - Sr. Embedded Firmware Engineer(Switch)
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
Overview:
At Ubiquiti, our mission is to simplify I.T. We strive for technology UX perfection everywhere — from our web store shopping experience, to product packaging details, to frictionless setup and installation flows. As a team, we value autonomy, so we want you to bring your ownership mindset in our pursuit of creating the best user experience. You’ll be challenged to use your creative problem-solving skills and work backwards to address the highest touch-point UX issues for our users, finding points of leverage and reducing risk. We place emphasis on working together, fostering an environment of trust and transparency.

Responsibilities (What he/she will do after join UI):
- Work with the team to deliver new switch products.
- Design, implement and verify required L2/L3 features.
- Work with forum customers closely to implement desired new features and fix issues.

Minimum Qualifications (MUST-haves) :
- PhD or MS in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering.
- Detailed knowledge of operating system internals, C/C++ language, object-oriented design, as well as strong C/C++ debugging skills on embedded-systems.
- Good knowledge on L2/L3 network protocol: VLAN/STP/LAG/LLDP/IGMP-Snooping/IP/IPv6/Routing, and etc.
- Hands-on experience with Networking.

Preferred Qualifications (Nice-to-haves / Plus) :
- 5 yrs+ working experience as a software engineer.
- Experience with L2/L3 switching features or Linux driver development.
- Aggressive working attitude.
- Team player, can work independently and have the ability to take initiative.
- Ability to organize and prioritize work across several projects.

job_name: [RD] 資深後端工程師(電子遊戲部)
cust_name: 天堂遊戲有限公司
job_detail:
【關於團隊】
電子遊戲部門於2020年3月正式運作至今，已經打造出數十款各具特色的電子遊戲產品，並且持續推出更多樣化的功能讓所有玩家能夠一同遊玩。

我們專注發展多樣化功能的電子遊戲平台，在這裡你將和 Product Manager、Engineer 和Designer 一同合作，使產品持續迭代，並提升用戶體驗與擴展新型業務在不同國家市場。

目前後端開發主要使用 Golang 與少部份Node.js，以及 ArangoDB 與其他第三方服務來完成分散式系統，在確保資料一致性的前提下滿足大流量的業務情境。你需要根據維運情況、市場目標來拆解需求與系統分析，進行架構優化、評估導入新技術的必要性、以及解決因為持續迭代過程中可能產生的技術問題。

【職務內容】
1. 帶領團隊成員參與開發新專案 (e.g. 需求拆解, 技術選型, 實作討論, etc.)
2. 帶領團隊成員分析 on-board projects 數據 (e.g. 根據 APM 分析產線壓力狀況)
3. 掌握現有架構，協助架構優化與技術選型 (e.g. 分析一致性問題, 效能瓶頸, clean code, etc.)
4. 持續學習新技術、主動分享並嘗試將適合的技術導入

### In the first month:

- 了解團隊目標、目前產品和未來規劃
- 搭建自己的工作環境，掌握當前的分散式架構 (e.g. 傳輸/編碼協定, 服務框架, 業務邏輯, etc.)
- 掌握目前使用的相關技術 (e.g. NATS, Redis, ArangoDB, etc.)

### In the first three months:

- 開始參與需求 (e.g. 新產品, 功能擴充/變更, etc.) 討論, 並確實完成交付
- 掌握當前資料處理的設計目的 (e.g. DB Schema, Data flow, etc.)
- 分析系統瓶頸，提出可被實踐的解決方案 (e.g. RCA → 測試報告 → 解決方案 → 加入排程)

### In the first six months, expect to:

- 擔任 Mentor 帶領團隊其他成員
- 了解產品下一階段目標，事前規劃協助推動產品迭代
- 與 Team Lead 討論下一階段的職涯規劃

【必要條件】
1. 熟悉 Golang
2. 熟悉 Git
3. 熟悉 Redis, NATS
4. 熟悉任何一種 NoSQL(document model) 資料庫
5. 具備 Docker 與 Cloud (e.g. GCP, AWS) 開發經驗
6. 具備 Unit Testing 與 Integration Testing 經驗
7. 具備分散式架構開發經驗

【加分條件】
1. 熟悉 Node.js
2. 熟悉任何一種 Statically Programming Language 如何實現 thread-safe 與 garbage collection 機制
3. 熟悉任何一種 Message Streaming Platform (e.g. NATS, Kafka)
4. 熟悉任何一種 RDB 與 NoSQL，了解 ACID 與如何確保資料一致性
5. 熟悉並實現過 CI/CD

job_name: Flutter / iOS 工程師  (二十一世紀數位)
cust_name: PChome Online_網路家庭國際資訊(股)公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon與 Paypal結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一同挑戰。

此職務主要負責開發Flutter App，並與iOS原生程式做串接，由於開發的是一個全新的平台，你將可以擁有很高的開發自由度，與團隊一同研究技術方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個主要的電商務平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

【工作內容】
• 使用 Dart 及 Swift 開發 Flutter 應用程式。
• 根據產品需求完成需求分析、應用架構設計、模組設計、編碼、真機測試工作。

【應徵條件】
• 熟悉 Flutter widgets。
• 熟悉 Flutter 狀態管理。
• 具有 Restful API 串接能力。
• 熟悉 Git 操作。
• 兩年以上 iOS App 開發經驗，熟悉 Swift 以及 iOS SDK。
• 積極有熱忱、具有獨立解決問題能力、良好團隊溝通能力。
skill: 軟體程式設計, 網路程式設計
other:
【加分條件】
• 使用過其他跨平台框架 (ReactNative、Xamarin...等)。
• 有獨立開發項目並上架 AppStore 通過審核的經驗。

job_name: DevOps工程師 (二十一世紀數位)
cust_name: PChome Online_網路家庭國際資訊(股)公司
job_detail:
我們正打造全新的購物及金融服務平台，除了基礎的電商功能，將整合公司專業之金融線上線下服務，提供全方位的購物及支付在線服務。你可以想像你將會參與一個類似 Amozon與 Paypal結合的全新平台，商業面應用我們已經證實可行並穩定經營，技術上的實作期待有理想願景的你加入與我們一同挑戰。

此職務偏重創新與規劃，你將可以擁有很高的自由度，與團隊一同研究產品方案以達成多變的業務挑戰。我們將一起開發一個電商平台以及多個具擴充性與穩定性的金流支付服務。我們的團隊秉持敏捷的開發態度，在多變的市場，運用開發團隊的技術創造更多的價值。

開發氛圍上，我們極度強調團隊合作及效率，減少任何不必要的報告及會議(Scrum meeting還是有的)，讓開發團隊能專注於產品開發。我們極度重視如何在上班時間內將產出最大化，反對惡性加班，如果你認同我們的理念，歡迎加入我們，一起建立一個高效能的開發團隊。

主要技能要求如下：
1. 熟悉 Azure Pipeline / AWS CICD framework.
2. 熟悉docker和k8s.
3. 熟悉Azure / AWS等雲端IaaS/ PaaS等各項服務.
4. 熟悉Git的使用方式.

1.擁有AWS/Azure DevOPS相關證照
2.熟悉C#或Java程式語言
3.熟悉Azure SQL等資料庫管理

job_name: F0054 - Security Engineer
cust_name: 優比快股份有限公司
job_detail:
Major Duties and Responsibilities

Coordinate and execute security tasks related to technology projects.
Developing security infrastructure such as firewalls, load-balancers, DDoS, IPS, or security orchestration appliances.
Produce cyber network architectures and documentation.
Conduct maintenance and monitoring of cyber infrastructure security systems.
Conduct security research in keeping abreast of latest security issues.
Research system weaknesses and find countermeasures.
Provide advanced support in evaluation and implementation of cyber security requirements for technology systems.
Develop scripts and software to automate cyber security processes.
On occasion, direct the work of helpers, assistants, interns or temporary employees.



Knowledge, Skills & Abilities

Solid C/C++ programming and debugging skill
Demonstrated technical leadership experience.
Experience in administering CASB reverse proxies, forward proxies, and API integrations.
Experience in programming, developing, or scripting for interaction with API services.
Experience performing root cause analysis, risk evaluation, risk mitigation, and risk avoidance.
Experience in threat management solutions like open source Suricata.
Knowledgeable of and experience securing all operating systems to include UNIX, Linux, and OpenBSD. This knowledge should include experience with IPFW, PF, Firewall CMD, and other packet filtering technologies.
Ability to work efficiently, expeditiously, and independently with limited supervision.
Excellent communication and Interpersonal skills necessary to develop and maintain effective and appropriate working relationships
Ability to self-manage tasks for meeting schedules and deadlines of the work



Minimum Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree from an accredited college or university in Information Technology, Computer Science, Cyber Security, or a related field
Seven (7) or more years of experience in Information Technology or Cyber Security
Any equivalent combination of training, education, and experience that provides the required skills, knowledge, and abilities necessary to perform the essential job functions.
other:
Preferred Qualification
CISSP Certification

Verticurl (a WPP Company) is seeking to hire Marketing Technology Lead, to be a core member of our growing team in Taiwan.

As a Marketing Technology Lead, you will be responsible for leading sales and delivery of technical projects and programs on large, complex accounts. We deliver the services and solutions that power our clients’ businesses. We help clients tackle their biggest business problems and unlock growth potential through marketing technology. We partner with key tech players, like Adobe, Salesforce, Oracle and together, deliver bigger and better results. You are expected to have experience across marketing automation, CRM, and data-driven platforms, as well as system integration, combined with sales and new opportunity origination skills.

請至公司網站投遞個人履歷表，此職缺履歷登錄網址：https://bit.ly/3sx0bam


配合部門轉型，招募資深網路管理工程師，帶領團隊主責公司網路基礎架構及IDC系統設備升級維運，並協助相關評估檢測架構及編制技術文件。

【職務說明】
1. 主導公司網路基礎架構的設計、規劃及實施，根據公司業務及管理的需求，改善公司網路基礎架構 
2. 制定公司網路基礎架構的運作流程和政策，編制相關的技術文件 
3. 規劃網路管理機制，設定、維護與檢修網路設備 
4. 定期完成公司安全風險評估和檢測 
5. 監控系統運作效能，執行問題處理標準流程，並建立危機處理的標準流程 
6. 熟悉電腦網路及網路安全維護，網路故障分析、判斷與快速處理 
7. 管理維護網路防火牆、交換器(Switch) 
8. 與其它IT團隊和跨部門合作，共同進行新技術研究和測試 

【職務需求】
1.  5年以上網路相關工作經驗，需要有大型網路管理經驗。 
2. 熟悉主流廠商的路由器、交換機、防火牆、UPS等設備的配置和管理。 
3. 精通滲透測試，熟練掌握各種滲透測試工具，精通常見的安全攻防技術。
4. 熟悉和處理過常見網路攻擊，如 DDoS、DNS 劫持等突發網路安全事件的快速處理。 
5. 需on-call，及配合假日離峰時段進行系統建置作業。
6. 態度積極，重視團隊合作，具協調溝通能力。 

【加分條件】 
1. 熟悉TCP/IP原理、網路基本原理和流行的網路技術，包括（但不限於）：LAN Switching、VLAN、TCP/IP Protocol、Routing Protocols、WAN、NAT、ACL、IP Security、Wireless LAN。 
2. 需具備CCNA證照，另具有CISCO CCNP以上資訊專業認證尤佳。。

job_detail:

請至公司網站投遞個人履歷表，此職缺履歷登錄網址：https://bit.ly/3vEA0Qj

【產品說明】 
從國泰集團出發，建立新型態的服務是我們的目標，因應市場情況、產品策略快速調整是我們的挑戰。在未來的工作中你/妳將投入，包含數據處理/分析/推薦/行銷、區塊鏈等服務的規劃經營。歡迎具備不怕改變、樂於學習、勇於回饋的人才加入。

【工作內容】
1. 負責區塊鏈、Data Pipeline, 網站等AWS雲端/地端伺服器維運工作。

2. 2年以上的維運工程師經驗。
3. Docker、Kubernetes、Gitlab CI/CD管理維運經驗。
4. 撰寫Shell腳本完成日程工作。
5. 熟悉 Prometheus、ELK。

job_name: 品牌視覺設計/商品視覺設計/影片拍攝與剪輯
cust_name: 烘焙找材料_心果有限公司
job_detail:
職缺描述
>目前職缺正在招募中，歡迎投遞履歷
>需自備筆記型電腦
>新鮮人與有工作經驗者皆可投遞，依能力討論薪資
>熱不熱愛烘焙非必要條件，但喜歡烘焙當然有加分，因為你會更理解消費者，但若不熱愛烘焙也是可以投遞，且不影響錄取與否，只要靠後天方法補足即可，這點我們會協助你達成

-


Ｏ應徵前常見疑惑解析：
Q1：來烘焙找材料上班一定要熱愛烘焙嗎？
A1：不一定。若你熱愛烘焙當然有可能因為工作即興趣的關係，工作上比較愉悅；但我們也非常歡迎本身非烘焙愛好者的同事加入，提供我們另外的視野。
Q2：畢業生可以應徵嗎？非本科系可以投遞嗎？
A2：可以。無論你是否具備工作經驗，我們都很歡迎你投遞履歷。你只需要確認你是一個具備不怕挫折與問題解決能力的人。

-

o公司描述：

烘焙找材料是由社群為核心的烘焙材料垂直電商，在短短幾年時間所經營的官方社團已累績超過8萬名使用者。目前為全台成長速度最快的烘焙電商。也在2018年錄取AppWorks(全亞洲最大的創業加速器)。我們是一間以『精實創業』與『成長駭客』為核心的台灣新創公司。期待您能與我們一起改變烘焙這個老舊的產業。

工作上我們很認真，但平時工作時辦公室內絕對是充滿笑聲、零食，如果怕吵的不要加入XD

-

o我們再找：

-本身很想變強且想挑戰自己的人
-沒達到目標絕不放棄的人
-願意以夥伴思維思考，而非員工思維的人
-自律、細心、善於溝通且具有回報能力者

＊『想應徵者必看』，關於烘焙找材料：http://bit.ly/2Ow1Vjb


-

o工作內容（歡迎新鮮人與有工作經驗者投遞）：

應徵前務必確認烘焙找材料的官網風格是不是你有能力製作的，且是可以依循既有官網風格獨立製作圖片。另外工作內容會以商業設計為主，期待應徵者本身是認同做圖時能以商品銷售為導向來做設計。

我們期待你是一個喜歡行銷也懂設計的新創人，因為我們認為了解行銷的設計師才能站在消費者角度做出最貼近消費者的成品圖。（行銷可不必懂，但要有興趣）

1.製作官網商品頁面與商品圖片拍攝
2.自有商品視覺/包裝設計
3.烘焙線上課程的影片拍攝/剪輯
4.品牌化活動頁面設計






＊以上工作為大致工作內容，但會因公司方向不同而有調整＊

職務需求
o應徵必備條件（歡迎新鮮人與有工作經驗者投遞）：
1.有影音剪輯能力，懂 Adobe Premiere, iMovie 等剪輯軟體
2.有美編能力, 會使用 PS / illustrator / Canva 等平面設計工具
3.樂觀積極，執行力強，好溝通，設計內容須以消費者想法為主軸，而非自己主觀設計理念
4.具備評估成效，找出問題並優化的能力
5.因工作內容與行銷也有很大關連，所以希望你也熱愛行銷
6.具備獨立完成資料搜集、產圖能力（不是講一步做一步的那種）

o不管任何職位，若你有以下特質都會大大加分的加分條件：
1. 喜歡新創公司氣氛
2.我們很在乎：時間、自我管控、溝通能力與自我學習能力
3.希望你是一個死纏爛打，不怕挫折的為了達成目標，但又不會讓人厭惡反而被你所感動的能力。
-
o在這裡你：

1.每天上班時間八小時（工作時間為七小時），因為我們深信高效比工作時間長短更重要
2.手把手跟著創辦人學習，不需冒著創業的風險卻可以體驗一間公司成長的過程
3.工作環境充滿濃厚創新及開放氣氛（位於之初創投Appworks內）
4.不管是正職還是實習生，都不是做著雜事，而是真正可以使公司業績成長的工作
5.辦公室離捷運市政府站只要 1 分鐘
6.加入後保證過一兩年你比同年紀的同學強上好幾倍


想親自體驗一間公司0-1的階段，歡迎你跳上火箭，與我們一同飛行
請將履歷與任何能提高我們錄取你機率的作品寄至：kenchen@heybaker.com 與 kens9261004@gmail.com
(來信主旨『應徵烘焙找材料XX職位_姓名』)

cust_name: 星星碼頭職能治療所
job_detail:
條件要求：
1. 大學畢業者，職能治療、心理、社工或醫護、教育相關科系畢業者尤佳。
2. 本職位需要大量與人溝通及協助治療所規畫業務，應徵者需有一年以上工作經驗，有擔任過相關職位者尤佳。
3. 需具良好溝通協調能力，判斷、執行能力強。
4. 此份工作需要大量時間與小孩、家長相處，故喜愛小孩、喜愛與人相處、具備愛心與耐心者尤佳。


工作時間：
週二到週六
週間以午晚班為主，週六為早午班。

主要工作內容：
1. 規劃治療所業務，製作相關報表及監督檢核
2. 完成治療所排班及工作時程表，管理行事曆、準備會議議程，並負責會議協調與安排參與會議並撰寫會議記錄
3. 聯繫及執行治療師交代之行政事項
4. 一般文書資料處理、維護、更新、管理各類文件檔案和文件資料庫系統。
5. 收費及會計報表整理
6. 接待來訪治療所的個案、家長及外賓
7. 執行與治療所個案相關的聯繫事項
8. 規劃及採買治療所文具及其他日用品
9. 監督及管理治療所兼職人員及工讀生
10. 維護個案(兒童青少年)於課後衛教期間的安全
11. 治療所硬體消毒與管理
12.	其他交辦行政業務

工作地點：星星碼頭職能治療所(台北市信義區基隆路一段141號五樓之8)

員工福利：
1.	三節禮金(年終、端午、中秋)
2.	生日禮金
3.	勞動節禮金
4.	定時聚餐分享
5.	員工旅遊補助

月薪：35000-40000元(依照應徵者年資及能力調整)

cust_name: 萊翊國際企業有限公司
job_detail:
公司著重於網路市場，這是未來絕對的趨勢！
目前正以快速的方式持續成長，商品會拓展越來越多
我們是由一群年輕的團隊所組成，熱情有創意且不斷前進是我們的理念
熱忱的邀請您，加入我們的團隊！

工作內容如下：
1.設計網路商品圖文介紹與活動Banner。
2.設計製作平面文宣、海報和DM。
3.規劃商品包裝的設計理念，並進行提案。
4.修改並執行其設計理念。

假日09:30-18:30 平日13:00-21:00 
（若有需要可以不用全時段參與，可以四小時為單位接洽）

工作內容：

2. 治療課程前：協助家長/個案進門時，量體溫及噴乾洗手消毒。 
3. 治療課程後：治療師衛教期間，協助照顧孩子自由互動遊戲之安全。 
4. 整理教具及簡易維護環境
5.其他交辦之行政事務



欲以電子郵件聯繫者，請將履歷寄至星星碼頭電子信箱：starpier.ot@gmail.com，標題請註明：「應徵星星碼頭工讀生—您的大名」，初審符合者將以電話通知面試時間。

工讀生工作內容相對單純，徵求喜愛與孩子相處的治療師或大學生加入。工讀生可以在衛教時間跟孩子互動，也能聽到部分跟家長衛教的內容，吸取累積應對經驗。工作表現優良者亦可作為未來治療所擴展之治療師儲備人才。
other:
應徵資格：
1. 職能治療師、職能治療系或醫學、教育相關科系大學生(徵求大二以上學生)。
2. 此份工作需要大量時間與小孩、青少年及家長接觸，故喜愛小孩、喜愛與人相處、具備愛心與耐心者尤佳。

job_name: Internet前端工程師
cust_name: 奇禾互動行銷有限公司
job_detail:
在數位行銷團隊中作一個Internet工程師，是非常有趣的工作。一方面可以跟不同專業的設計、企劃、互動等等夥伴合作，另一方面也可以學習各種不同的技術與開發領域。
這也是現在網路世界不可或缺的職位，可以讓你廣泛涉獵不同的專業項目，跟上最新的數位技術應用，未來在這領域的發展無窮。

我們期望你有以下的技術專長：
1、有和創意設計人員一同完成專案的整合能力。
2、HTML CSS前端視覺研發工作，研究新的互動應用技術及特效。 
3、JS與資料庫的串接及應用研發。 
4、互動軟硬體技術整合的研發及應用。
5、能適應快速變化的網路行銷產業，有熱忱，主動學習討論並應用新技術。
6、喜歡接受新技術應用的挑戰，融入團隊合作。

主要工作內容
* 切版 (Photoshop/ Ziplin / Figma / Adobe XD => HTML + CSS )
* 使用 CSS 或 JS 製作網頁動態
* 使用 Vue.js串接後端API

工作條件需求
* 熟悉 JQuery Vue.js
* 頁面RWD架構及處理
* 上傳圖片檔案處理
* 網頁嵌入FB GA等追蹤碼
* 網頁嵌入 Youtube及運用
* 使用過前端打包工具 ( Webpack 等 ) 
* 處理跨瀏覽器，跨手機疑難雜症
* 有網站SEO 概念
* 使用瀏覽器網頁檢閱工具 ( dev tool )
* 串接臉書, LINE等社交平台 API
* 有良好記錄文件習慣，增進團隊溝通效率
* 調校網頁效能

job_name: ［外商無人機Drone研發］- RF Engineer 無線通訊工程師
cust_name: 智動航科有限公司(籌備處)
job_detail:
[Job description]
1. Responsible for RF solution design, device selection, antenna evaluation, wiring inspection, RF performance test and debugging of drone products; mainly responsible for 2.4G, 5.8G and other high-frequency designs.
2. Have related industries (TX, RX, STA, AP, frequency hopping, power consumption and other project experience), and need to work closely with EE/SW/ME/PM.
3. Responsible for the tracking and resolution of RF faults during the R&D and trial production phases of products;
4. Responsible for document output and archiving of product design documents, test documents and other project-related tasks.

[Job Requirements]
1. College degree or above, major in electromagnetic, microwave, electronic information engineering, communication engineering, etc.
2. Possess a solid antenna or microwave professional foundation, and have a deeper understanding of the principles of PIFA/monopole antennas.
3. Have 4G, 5G multi-frequency antenna design and debugging experience, familiar with antenna related test indicators and certification standards.
4. Familiar with the basic theoretical knowledge in the field of drones.
5. Familiar with simulation software such as HFSS, skilled in using network segmentation and spectrum equipment.
6. More than 3 years experience, proficient in RF and antenna theory, at least understand one of BT, WIFI, ZIGBEE and other wireless technologies; familiar with antenna, LNA, power amplifier scheme and device selection.

job_name: ［外商無人機High-end Drone研發］- Sr.Image Quality Engineer 資深影像品質工程師
cust_name: 智動航科有限公司(籌備處)
job_detail:
We are XDynamics-a group of passionate image makers and experience creators.

We work tirelessly to bring the most advanced technologies in the aerial imaging market within the grasp of all creators and pilots.

We do so in a unique, compelling and incomparable way so our customers can truly take their vision and talents to new heights.

We are seeking a PASSIONATE engineer with in-depth knowledge on camera 3A for New Image Sensor Technologies!


Key Responsibilities

·Hands on and continuously striving for excellence from yourself and your extended team.
·Able to spot image quality and ability to triage issues, react well to changes, work with teams and ability to multi-task on multiple products and projects.
·Must be familiar with modern imaging techniques, such as high dynamic range (HDR) and tone-mapping.
·Familiar with 3A (Auto Focus, Auto White Balance, Auto Exposure) or ISP(Image signal processing).


Role Qualifications

·Degree or above in Optical Science, Imaging Science, and Physical or equivalent.
·5+ years working on image quality evaluation and management for image sensors, digital camera or other imaging systems.
·Previous knowledge in lab management and test setup design and implementation.
·Expertise in 3A(Auto white balance, auto exposure, autofocus) and HDR.
·Solid Knowledge in the domain of Camera technology and Optics.
·Familiar with C,C++,Linux, or other equivalent programming languages.

A plus but not mandatory
·Automotive Camera Systems
·Realize 3A system solution into various chipset
·Design of camera systems that combine 3A, ISP to achieve best image quality and balance power, memory to maximize system performance
·Python, Tensorflow, OpenCV
·Experience with camera manufacturing and/or lens testing automation in the factory
specialty: C, C++, Matlab, Python, ARM, Drivers
skill: 軟體工程系統開發, 軟體程式設計, 光學系統研發設計, 光學系統測試分析

XDynamics is currently seeking a Camera Embedded Software Engineer with experience in developing Linux devices.

Successful candidates must have a strong technical background and be capable of coming up to speed with a new team quickly. Strong analytical, problem solving, and communication skills are essential as well as the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Key Responsibilities

·Research, Design and Develop AF/AE/AWB function for camera processing.
·Establishing framework and function development.
·Collaborate with camera team(photographer/IQ/ISP vendor) on drone cinematic
camera function analysis/software design/coding.
·Responsible for camera systematic optimization/test/production.

Qualification

·Master's degree in Computer Science, Imaging science, Electronic engineering,
or related field.
·4+ years experience in Camera ISP framework / Function
development / Sensor and peripheral driver.
·Solid C/C++ language development experience.
·Familiar with Linux/ARM structure, development experience within embedded
system/debugging tools/power consumption tuning.
·Experienced with multimedia frameworks such as CAMX and Gstreamer.
·Familiar with Linux network programming, ISP architecture/video/audio codec
experience is preferred.
·Photography/aerial photography enthusiasm is a plus.

job_name: ［外商無人機High-end Drone研發］-Industrial Designer 工業設計師
cust_name: 智動航科有限公司(籌備處)
job_detail:
[What you will do]

1) Work with cross-functional teams and establish the design brief, including the concept, performance and production criteria in line with company core mission and value.

2) Work on ideas as part of a team or developing design concepts using CAD.

3) Identify the suitability and availability of materials.

4) Produce detailed, final hand drawings and specifications or using dedicated computer software to produce design specifications.

5) Making samples or working models by hand or using computerized prototyping equipment.

6) Test the design concept by computerized modeling or physical hands-on testing of models.

7) Research materials, processes or market requirements.

8) Work closely with external resources and suppliers to drive on-time delivery of components and devices.

[Key Qualifications]

1) Bachelor Degree or above, in Product/Industrial Design, with 3 to 5 years work experience.

2) Self-starter with passion for innovation, development of new, better products and Industrial Design.

3) Experience in robotics, automobile and drone is a plus.

6) Microsoft Office, and other 3D CAD software are a plus.

7) Ability to understand and develop innovative mechanical designs solutions is an advantage.

8) Familiarity with plastics, metal applications and tooling manufacturing processes.

9) Strong presentation skill both on paper (illustrator/indesign) and in person

10) All candidates must provide personal portfolio / samples of previous work in digital format with their application.

[Preferred Skill-sets]

Experience within the UAV industry is a clear a plus.

job_name: 職能治療師
cust_name: 星星碼頭職能治療所
job_detail:
條件要求：

1. 具職能治療師執照

2. 具精神科職能治療實務工作經驗者、具學校系統實務工作經驗者尤佳

3. 歡迎應屆畢業生加入星星碼頭團隊，待人處事成熟且有彈性者尤佳

4. 歡迎具備以下特質的治療師加入：
a. 對兒心領域抱有熱忱，對自費職能治療市場感到興趣，想提升自我能力
b. 有團隊合作經驗，具高度溝通協調能力
c. 具備問題解決能力、危機應變能力，高度抗壓性
d. 喜愛與人相處，樂於探索、分享自身感受及想法
e. 因應治療對象和家屬需求，需能配合假日出勤及晚班
f. 期待合理薪資及福利的工作環境，且願意扎實精進

工作說明：

星星碼頭職能治療所自2020年8月份成立以來，目前已營運約2年。在疫情期間成立的治療所必定越發強壯，我們的業務量持續穩定提升，需要更多有志之士一同投入。如果您「想要專精兒童青少年精神醫學」、「想要精進職能治療自費項目」或是「對於參與新創團隊的營運有興趣」，星星碼頭皆會提供完善的訓練及督導，歡迎您前來加入。

「讓個案得到專業服務」及「讓治療師得到適當的待遇」是星星碼頭成立的兩大理念。

「全人」、「全程」的長期治療模式，讓治療師能夠安心地陪伴孩子長大。職能治療師除了能夠在早療領域協助特殊孩子，步入學齡、國高中生的青少年亦需要治療師的專業協助。星星碼頭治療師們不需要倉促地讓孩子畢業，而是可以安穩地陪伴孩子走過人生每一個重要階段。

「讓職能治療師得到適當的待遇」亦是星星碼頭的重要理念。有鑑於現況下治療師專業與其受薪落差之情形，我們認為：「專業、用心的職能治療師值得更友善、合理的對待。」治療所致力於提供完善的訓練和福利制度，讓治療師能夠安心發揮所長。

欲知更多星星碼頭資訊，請參考：
星星碼頭簡介影片及環境介紹 https://bit.ly/3Q18S6C 
星星碼頭 職能治療師的兒心手記https://www.facebook.com/starpier/
星星碼頭職能治療所 https://www.facebook.com/starpier.ot/

工作內容：
1. 個別及團體職能治療
2. 提供家屬諮詢與建議
3. 職能治療評估
4. 處理治療所相關行政事項
5. 入校參與相關討論會議
6. 治療所接洽合作之外部服務(校園講座、營隊帶領等)

工作時間：
本院備有完善的培訓制度，新進治療師皆需跟課實習，以培養兒心領域相關專業能力，並熟悉治療所作業模式。

1. 實習治療師需配合現有治療課程時間出勤，周間以下午及晚上為主，周末以早上和下午為主。
2. 實習完成、可獨立作業後，正式治療師每周帶領15-20堂治療課程(可依個人意願增加)。為維持治療師的生活品質，治療師每周晚班以不超過2天為主。

薪資待遇：
治療所符合勞基法及健保規範，依法制定有完善的工作手冊。給薪採固定底薪及業績獎金抽成制。
1. 實習治療師：帶薪實習期間給薪為固定薪資。
2. 正式治療師：薪資為固定底薪及業績獎金。業績獎金採分階段抽成制，業績達標即可提升抽成比例。以每周15-20堂治療課程為例，月薪可達45000-90000以上。依個人意願及能力，亦可開發自費項目及增加治療堂數。

員工福利：
1. 公會年費補助
2. 學會年費補助
3. 與醫學中心合作外訓
4. 治療所內專業課程
5. 治療所外專業課程進修補助
6. 研究獎勵
7. 三節禮金(年終、端午、中秋)
8. 生日禮金
9. 勞動節禮金
10. 定時聚餐分享
11. 員工旅遊補助

履歷請包含以下資料：
1. 個人履歷 (需有照片以及自傳，應屆畢業生須附上歷年成績單)
2. 最高學歷之畢業證書影本
3. 職能治療師證書影本
4. 其他佐證資料

欲以電子郵件投遞者，請將履歷寄至星星碼頭電子信箱：starpier.ot@gmail.com，標題請註明：「應徵星星碼頭職能治療師—您的大名」，初審符合者將以email及電話通知面試時間。

job_name: 資深網站行銷企劃Digital SAE
cust_name: 奇禾互動行銷有限公司
job_detail:
工作職責：
1. 獨立執行大型品牌/商品網站建置、網路活動製作、IMC整合活動執行以及媒體製作與採購流程。
2. 管理專案流程，包含進度掌握、成本控制以及與內部設計/程式人員溝通協調。
3. 獨立完成提案撰寫並具備提案/溝通說明能力。
4. 需與客戶討論品牌/商品行銷策略並給予客戶建議。

任職資格：
1. 專科以上學歷，具備基本英語溝通能力。
2. 需有三年以上網路行銷相關工作經驗，有廣告代理商經驗尤佳。
3. 正面積極，對數位媒體熟系，有熱誠且樂於接受各種新事物及挑戰。
4. 熟悉Office各項工具。
5.廣代經驗1-2年
6.需熟悉數位行銷，能獨立完成執行作業：包含活動網頁/網站規劃/支援數位提案
7.孰悉不同平台官方帳號維運(如Line OA)
8.掌握時程、預算、執行成效提案;更重要的是維運客戶關係

這樣的你很適合：
每天不上網就會恐慌、不接收新鮮事物就會抓狂；脾氣不一定好但EQ比IQ高；膽大心細、反應快、有愛心；自信心十足，熱情卻又冷靜，沒什麼事能嚇得倒你。

job_name: Internet後端工程師
cust_name: 奇禾互動行銷有限公司
job_detail:
在數位行銷團隊中作一個Internet工程師，是非常有趣的工作。一方面可以跟不同專業的設計、企劃、互動等等夥伴合作，另一方面也可以學習各種不同的技術與開發領域。
這也是現在網路世界不可或缺的職位，可以讓你廣泛涉獵不同的專業項目，跟上最新的數位技術應用，未來在這領域的發展無窮。

我們期望你有以下的技術專長：
1. ASP.NET (C#) Core / MVC 網站開發。
2. MSSQL的Query語法及操作。
3. 基礎Javascript/Json/AJAX/jQuery要看得懂喲
4. 後端資料處理部份會使用到Vue.js
5. 有開發大型系統專案或對其有興趣想試試的好手也很歡迎

歡迎喜歡玩新技術應用的人一起加入團隊

期盼你有以下的人格特質：
1. 重視團隊合作，樂於溝通。
2. 有獨立作業的能力。
3. 對學習新的技術或開發有興趣或熱情。

目前歡迎滿1年經驗以上，喜歡跟年輕團隊合作的人加入我們
specialty: AJAX, ASP.NET, C#, Visual Studio .net, MS SQL, MySQL, HTML, JavaScript, jQuery
skill: 網路程式設計, 資料庫程式設計

3. 有責任感、可獨立作業、積極主動
4. 有相關經驗者尤佳

job_name: ［矽谷知名創投DCM Ventures 投資］資深後端工程師(NodeJs/PHP)｜WFH遠端工作｜外商徵才
cust_name: 八達有限公司
job_detail:
​【Why Join Us】
·我們是一間快速增長的香港Startup，客戶包括保險和通訊企業等大公司，也有醫療、電子商務、教育和零售領域的中小企業，最近完成融資，獲得一些亞洲最優秀的投資者支持
·一起創新顧客戶互動解決方案，幫助商家通過通訊軟件(WhatsApp, Line, Wechat 等)與顧客溝通，提升銷量和顧客服務
·公司認股權，與公司一起成長並獲得豐厚回報

【工作內容​】
·規劃和實現REST APls和CLl工具
​·整合不同的API管道（Whatsapp, FB, Line, WeChat, Instagram等) 
​·整合不同的第三方平台（Zapier, Shopify, Salesforce等) 
​·識別技術瓶頸並實施優化
​·與其他工程師一同改進內部開發工具，使工作能用更快、更安全地進行
​·​與面向客戶的團隊合作，排除故障，修復bugs​
​·編寫單元和整合測試，確保開發出高質量的軟體​

【必要條件】
·3年或以上相關工作經驗。
·熟悉nodejs, PHP, Restful APls, MYSQL, git等技術
·優秀的資料庫/ SQL技能，包括性能優化和標準化
·熟悉Linux和命令行
·良好的中英語書客能力

【人格特質​】
·高自我管理：你不僅要做好被分配的工作，還要瞭解其原因，對產品其他部分和客戶的影響，以及這樣做是否有意義，我們期望你對工作負責，並解決任何可能製造的漏洞。
​·熱衷於溝通：儘管這個職位應聘為前端工程師，但希望你能對整個專案有一定瞭解，與團隊中的工程師有效溝通，並在需要的時候對後端或基礎設施做出改變或建議，能夠提出和接受有建設性的回饋​​

【加分項目​】
·有Full Stack經驗者優先
·有DevOps經驗者優先
·擅長英文口語溝通

【Hiring Process】
·15-20 分鐘Teams Virtual Interview
·線上小測試，大部份人能在1小時內完成
·1小時Teams Virtual Interview，與技術團隊交流技術
·45分鐘Teams Virtual Interview，了解個人跟團隊合作及工作的經驗

如對職缺有興趣，請發電郵到chantalyang@secondtalent.com，電郵內只需指明您有興趣的職缺及附帶英文履歷即可
​

job_name: Lead Product Manager
cust_name: 美商知識能股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_detail:
Kono Digital Inc. (TW) is looking for a Lead/Senior Product Manager as we embark on the next phase of our product development. You’ll be responsible for our product lines that cover B2B, B2B2C, and B2C markets, with users ranging from publishers to independent content creators to content consumers. You’ll work with our designer and user researcher, and collaborate closely with Engineering, Business Development, Marketing, and Content teams. The ideal candidate enjoys working in a fast paced environment building new to market products, as well as iterating on existing features for growth opportunities. This is a high growth role and we are looking for someone with the right fit in terms of skillset as well as company mission and culture.

Your Will

- Define the product vision and align with different stakeholders to manage the entire life cycle of the product - from idealization to find the product market fit (0-1) to grow the business (1-100)
- Monitoring the market and developing competitive analyses to ensure the product line is adjusted to the market accordingly
- Work closely across teams to spearhead our product roadmap, collaborating with Engineering, Business Development, and Marketing to take the roadmap from concept to reality. 
- Serve as the voice of our B2B and B2C customers. Design experiments. Use both quantitative and qualitative signals to identify customer needs and come up with product features together with Design and Customer Success team members
- Partner with the engineering team to help find optimal solutions as well as tradeoffs as well. Commit reasonable implementation schedules for product releases
- Identify market opportunities partnering with Business Development as well as Marketing teams and define a product vision and strategy to capitalize on these opportunities
- Iterate on existing products based on customer feedback and user insights

You Have

Preferably 3+ years of experience in product management (B2B or B2C). Demonstrated track record of successfully building, shipping, and iterating on products in an agile software development environment

- A strategic thinker who can act like the general manager of the product line you manage by knowing the product vision, how it will generate customer value and what is the differentiating advantage over its competitors
- A genuine passion for product and an obsession over user experience. You care deeply about our users and can turn user stories into well thought out user journeys and product specs
- Data literacy and the ability to ask the right questions in order to design experiments and user research to dig for insights
- Well organized and detail oriented with the ability to balance multiple concurrent priorities in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. You are comfortable with ambiguity and knows how to ask for help and how to use frameworks to solve thorny issues. You understand complex business problems and can craft effective strategies to tackle them
- Outstanding written and verbal cross team communication skills. You thrive in teamwork. You possess the ability for independent thinking as well as the grace for constructive feedback, both taking and giving.

job_name: Assistant Digital Communications Manager
cust_name: 香奈兒有限公司
job_detail:
RESPONSIBILITIES: 
Assist senior media manager in providing best performance solutions that serve brand and business purposes through strategic media planning as well as keen market and audience understanding. Bring forward thinking and ahead of market approach to the team to achieve “Only Chanel Can Do” vision.

1.Media Trend and Insight
-Keen observation and knowledge of upfront and emerging media trend
-Understanding of luxury market and audience insights for each business division
-Understanding of E-business and E-service market landscape
-Review competitive activation and insights

2. Performance Media Strategy Planning
-Set online media strategies to reach full-funnel business goals, including visibility, engagement, acquisition and retention.
-Work with Media Agency to develop short to long term data driven media strategy to accelerate E-commerce growth
-Work with regional team on accelerating digital service that connect with paid media roles
-Collaborate with product and marketing team to achieve campaign effectiveness
-Collaborate with CRM, omni-channel and EC teams to optimize audience segmentation and paid media performance
-Social media management paid & owned
-Corporate and divisional SEM strategy & performance
-Work with media agency to optimize campaigns results across platforms.

3. Digital Transformation
-Collaborate with CRM, omni-channel and TDS teams to create seamless consumer journey and experience on digital service development and SEO projects (incl but not limited to GA4, and cookieless era)
-Set short to long term data roadmap and work with TDS team on CDP project
-Closely work with key digital partners on pilot projects and seize local initiative opportunities when possible.

4. Leadership Of Media Agency And Key Partners		
-Give clear brief to media agency including market context, client composition,  business objective and direction of role of media.
-Work with media agency on media plan development to ensure media strategy is in line with brand and business objective
-Manage day to day relationship and operation with media agency and deliver best practice management incl. workflow, relationships management and agency evaluation
-Keep track of digital campaign performance and make constant adjustment whenever needed

5. Communications With Internal Stakeholders
-Build collaborative relationship with internal stakeholders (marketing, omni-channel, CRM, TDS, finance…etc)
-Work closely with marketing and omni-channel team to drive for best practice and investment efficiency		
-Constant communication with regional and global media counterparts to ensure strategy alignment and seek best practice learning from other countries

ROLE-SPECIFIC BUSINESS SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
• Strong performance media background 
• Proficient with Google Marketing Platforms, Google Ads, SEM & SEO, Programmatic Buying, Facebook Ads are preferred
• Google & Meta Certification preferred
• Media Insight
• Leadership in Media Agency
• Media Optimization Knowledge

LEADERSHIP CAPABILITIES
• Adaptability and transformational
• Strong analytical skill
• Strategic thinker
• Curiosity and agility 
• Sense of aesthetic (appreciation for art, beauty, luxury)
• Emotionally grounded 

At Chanel, we are focused on creating an inclusive culture that nurtures personal growth, contributing to collective progress. We believe the uniqueness of each individual increases the diversity, complementarity and effectiveness of our teams. We strongly encourage your application, as we value the perspective, experience and potential you could bring to CHANEL.

● 撰寫過知識型、無形產品..等銷售文案

job_name: 【門市部】台北區儲備店長
cust_name: 邦尼利得國際實業股份有限公司
job_detail:
【工作內容及具備條件】
1. 具備一年以上流行配飾/包鞋服飾管理經驗尤佳，熟悉銷售技巧，抗壓性高，有高度責任感。
2. 領導門市營運管理及推動業績目標達成，人員培訓並考核工作績效。
3. 門市店務基本報表、系統操作運用及相關行政作業。
4. 協助門市陳列佈置、清潔、進貨、轉調相關商品管理。
5. 提供顧客諮詢與服務，並結合網路電商及實體門市的銷售。
6. 在門市內服務顧客提供商品介紹及商品銷售。
7. 需配合門市/百貨輪調。

【休假及福利制度】
1. 年資滿半年即享特休假。
2. 每月休假9天，休假天數會依據上班時數調整。
3. 排班制度，班別多元化，排班更彈性。
4. 享勞健保、勞退、業績獎金、生日禮金、員購、下午茶點心，員工福利佳。
5. 需配合假日及國定假日排班。

【獎金制度】
1. 業績獎金採團績+個績制。
2. 獎金組成：門市團績抽成、個人業績抽成、多元績效獎金，主管加給獎金...等。
3. 視工作狀況及溝通協調能力加薪提升管理職位。

※此職務須配合門市輪調。
※投遞履歷時需附上個人Instagram帳號。
※本職缺公告之薪資，適用於達成月營業目標並通過公司考核之正式人員。
other:

- 抗壓性高
- 負責任
- 耐心

job_name: 顧問諮詢服務專員(日文)
cust_name: 臺灣普萊斯梯基有限公司
job_detail:
• 根據客戶之要求及指示，協助他們管理及提供優質的客戶服務給其顧客
• 透過多種渠道(網上平台、電話、傳真及信件等)提供優質的客戶服務給顧客
• 就顧客的查詢，作出專業、準確及詳細的解答
• 接聽海外求助熱線查詢及支援服務
• 根據需要轉傳電話/電子郵件到相應之部門跟進及處理
• 於查詢過程中（點對點）管理內部及外部部門之聯絡
• 對收集到的個人信息（保密性）作出小心及適當之處理
• 主動提供反饋給主管，提高運營和服務水平
• 與客戶及顧客建立良好關係
• 有須要時協助及支援生成有關所需的報告
• 被指派執行臨時任務

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
• 全世界に駐在している　企業の駐在員がお持ちの弊社の保険のアシスタントをするお仕事です。
• カスタマーサービスではありますが、保険の対象可否を実際に判断し、いくら保険金を。返金するかまでの計算も行っていただく、専門的な保険査定員の仕事内容も含みます。
• 専門的保険約款を学んでいただく必要性があります。実務で指導、覚えて頂きます。
※外国籍の方には就業VISA, 社会保障手続きを行います。
